youtube.title: How Medicine Works: The Journey of a Pill Through Your Body
youtube.description: Discover the fascinating science behind how medication travels through the digestive system, into the liver, and reaches your bloodstream to provide relief. A step-by-step biological animation of pharmacology in action.
